PAD_NoticeShrine.synopsis: The party comments on a little shrine they've discovered in a cavern - a grotto containing a statue and some prayers and offerings left by worshippers. Players may or may not recognise that the statue is the goddess Selûne. Shadowheart, as well as certain cleric/paladin tags, will recognise the statue always.

PAD_PickupPrayerSheet.synopsis: The player comments after picking up an old prayer sheet. They may or may not recognise that it could help them unlock a magically sealed chest.

PAD_TriggeredTrap.synopsis: The player reacts to a magically-locked chest injuring them upon attempting to open it without disabling the protections.

PAD_NoticeStashSeal.synopsis: Following a passive arcana check, the player comments that a chest discovered at a shrine has a spell cast over it, protecting its contents.

PAD_OpenStashWithPrayer.synopsis: The player passes comment after they manage to open a magically sealed chest by reciting a prayer they found. If Shadowheart or a worshipper of Shar is speaking, the prayer does nothing.

PAD_OpenStashAsSelunite.synopsis: A Selûne-worshipping player manages to unseal a magically locked chest after reading a prayer.

PAD_NoticeShrine_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeShrine_0.text: Over there - a shrine to Selûne. By Moonmaiden's grace.
PAD_NoticeShrine_0.context: NodeContext: Shar worshipper: notices the Selune shrine and makes a disdainful comment. Selune worshippers: notices the shrine and reacts with reverence.

PAD_NoticeShrine_1.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeShrine_1.text: Looks like there's a little shrine over there.

PAD_NoticeShrine_2.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeShrine_2.text: A Selûne statue? In a stinking cave? Hardly a place of honour.

PAD_NoticeShrine_3.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeShrine_3.text: Looks like a shrine to Selûne over there.

PAD_NoticeShrine_4.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeShrine_4.text: A Selûne statue? In a stinking cave? Hardly a place of honour, even for the likes of her.

PAD_PickupPrayerSheet_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PickupPrayerSheet_0.text: A prayer sheet. What's this symbol on it?

PAD_PickupPrayerSheet_1.speaker: Player
PAD_PickupPrayerSheet_1.text: A prayer sheet. With the same symbol as the one on the chest.

PAD_TriggeredTrap_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TriggeredTrap_0.text: Agh! This thing won't yield its contents easily...
PAD_TriggeredTrap_0.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a moderate jolt of pain.

PAD_NoticeStashSeal_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticeStashSeal_0.text: There's magic keeping this chest sealed; I can feel its aura.

PAD_OpenStashWithPrayer_0.speaker: Player
PAD_OpenStashWithPrayer_0.text: Chest's unlocked. My prayers are answered.
PAD_OpenStashWithPrayer_0.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a prayer unlocking a magically sealed chest.

PAD_OpenStashAsSelunite_0.speaker: Player
PAD_OpenStashAsSelunite_0.context: NodeContext: Hushed awe. A good omen from their goddess.
